get.description:
## Overview
Get External Connected Payment Application.

## Authentication
**Available for Client Tokens only.**

## Prerequisites
Requires a payment application (app_type=payments) to be installed and **fully connected** for the business. Returns 422 if no connected payment app exists.

### What "Fully Connected" Means
A payment app is considered fully connected when:
1. The app is assigned to the business via `POST /v3/apps/app_assignments`
2. The business has `external_[app_name]_connected=true` flag set
3. The app is not in pending/setup mode
4. For vcitaPayments: Terms and conditions must be accepted

## When to Use
- Getting the primary payment provider for checkout flows
- Checking if payment processing is available

description.text: This is a very long text that describes everything about the app

errors.message: To store cards on file connect to a credit card processor

post.description:
## Overview
Create New Card On File.

## Authentication
**Available for Client Tokens only.**

## Prerequisites
Requires an active payment processor connection (Stripe, vcitaPayments, etc.) to be configured for the business account before cards can be stored.

parameters.description: uid of the payment with which the card was created
parameters.name: source_payment

get.summary: Get most recent pending card added to client [Alpha]

post.description:
## Overview
Create a new save card session for adding a card on file.

## Authentication
**Available for Client Tokens only.**

## Prerequisites
- The business must have the `cp_add_new_cof` (Client Portal add new Card on File) feature enabled. This feature may be part of specific subscription plans.
- A connected payment processor must be configured for the business.

## Request Parameters
- `success_url` (required): URL to redirect to after successful card save
- `cancel_url` (required): URL to redirect to if the user cancels

success_url.description: URL to redirect to after successful card save

cancel_url.description: URL to redirect to if the user cancels

Create New Save Card Session.

## Authentication

## Overview
Creates a Cart.

## Authentication
**Available for Client Tokens only.**

## Request Format
The request body must be wrapped in a 'cart' object with required fields: matter_uid, currency, and items array.

## Overview
Get a list of Client Packages.

## Authentication
**Available for Client Tokens only.**

## Required Parameters
- `matter_uid` (required): The matter UID to fetch packages for.

## When to Use
- Viewing client's purchased packages
- Checking package balances

parameters.description: relevant matter_uid to fetch packages for
parameters.name: matter_uid

parameters.description: Sort by one of the following: created_at, updated_at, valid_from, valid_until.  available operators: asc, desc. example: sort=created_at:asc,updated_at:desc
parameters.name: sort

get.description:
## Overview
Show list of deposits.

## Authentication
**Available for Client Tokens only.**

## Required Parameters
- `matter_uid` (query, **required**): The matter UID to fetch deposits for. Returns 500 error if not provided.

## When to Use
- Viewing client's deposit history
- Checking deposit balances

parameters.description: relevant matter_uid to fetch deposits for
parameters.name: matter_uid

parameters.description: Sort by one of the following: created_at, updated_at. available operators: asc, desc. example: sort=created_at:asc,updated_at:desc
parameters.name: sort

get.description:
## Overview
Show specific deposit details.

## Authentication
**Available for Client Tokens only.**

## Parameters
- `uid`: The deposit UID
- `matter_uid`: Must correspond to the matter associated with the deposit

## Error Responses
- 422: Returns when the provided matter_uid doesn't match the matter associated with the deposit

## Overview
Show list of invoices.

## Authentication
**Available for Client Tokens only.**

## When to Use
- Viewing client's invoice history
- Building invoice list views

parameters.description: relevant matter_uid to fetch invoices for
parameters.name: matter_uid

parameters.description: Available filters: client_uid: filter[client_uid][eq]=123. matter_uid: filter[matter_uid][eq]=123. created_at: filter[created_at][eq/lt/lte/gt/gte]=2019-01-01. updated_at: filter[updated_at][eq/lt/lte/gt/gte]=2019-01-01. uid: filter[uid][in]=123,456
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Sort by one of the following: created_at, updated_at. available operators: asc, desc. example: sort=created_at:asc,updated_at:desc
parameters.name: sort

invoices.billing_address: 1 Bay St, San Francisco, CA, United States

parameters.description: The business UID (unique identifier string like '88pzdbz1hmkdoel4'). Note: Use the UID format, not the numeric database ID.
parameters.name: business_id

parameters.description: When present, returns only active packages
parameters.name: active_only

get.description:
## Overview
Get the checkout session of a given payment request.

## Authentication
**No authentication token required.** This endpoint is designed for client checkout flows and skips token verification.

## Coupon Functionality
The optional `coupon_code` parameter applies a discount to the payment request. **Note:** Business must have `rollout.payments.coupons_checkout_v2` feature enabled and active coupons available. Returns 422 error if business is not eligible for coupon functionality.

## When to Use
- Client checkout flows
- Viewing payment request details
- Applying coupon discounts

parameters.description: Optional coupon code to apply discount to the payment request
parameters.name: coupon_code
